details.alternative_title: The Energy and the Environment Open Data Challenge
details.content:
The Energy and the Environment Challenge will identify ways that open data can respond to energy problems in the UK.

On 24 October 2013, 50 domain experts came together for our Energy and Environment Challenge Definition Day in Birmingham. They were tasked with exploring energy problems that will form the challenge in 2014. They examined:

  • Home energy investment decisions
  • Action on fuel poverty
  • Supporting and stimulating Smart choice
  • Supporting energy monitoring technology
  • Building tools to support community energy services

To find out more visit this Storify collection.

The challenge will open for applications in January 2014. To register your interest email: opendata@nesta.org.uk.

For latest news on the series follow @odchallenges.
